Letters of intercommuning against several persons declared fugitives for not compearing to answer for conventicles, &c. Scotland. Privy Council. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed by the heirs of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : anno Dom. 1676.
Below imprint:Cum Privilegio. Arms 232; Steele notation: of ters seve-. Dated at end: Edinburgh, the third day of August, one thousand six hundred seventy and six years, and of Our Reign, the twenty eight year. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
=======
